channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- LXCI for VMware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- LXCI for VMware

item.title: CVE-2018-16093|2024-08-05T10:17:37.690Z -- lenovo -- lxci%20for%20vmware
item.description: In versions prior to 5.5, LXCI for VMware allows an authenticated user to write to any system file due to insufficient sanitization during the upload of a backup file.

item.title: CVE-2018-16097|2024-08-05T10:17:37.668Z -- lenovo -- lxci%20for%20vmware
item.description: LXCI for VMware versions prior to 5.5 and LXCI for Microsoft System Center versions prior to 3.5, allow an authenticated user to write to any system file due to insufficient sanitization during the upload of a certificate.

item.title: CVE-2018-9072|2024-08-05T07:17:50.638Z -- lenovo -- lxci%20for%20vmware
item.description: In versions prior to 5.5, LXCI for VMware allows an authenticated user to download any system file due to insufficient input sanitization during file downloads.
